title: Bloodmoon Diana
body:
It could be the legendary skin of the Bloodmoon skins
http://i912.photobucket.com/albums/ac326/cymnalrush/Salena_Barnes-Discipline_Illustration_final_small_02.jpg
http://pre14.deviantart.net/dfac/th/pre/i/2015/056/a/a/blood_moon_diana_by_xelandra-d69idvx.png

replies.body:
I just realized Diana doesn't have a BloodMOON skin yet.
I find this information... unpalatable.

Nah, it's dumb because she already has the MOON concept all over her base skin, it'd make no sense for her to have a MOON skin.

Think how dumb Void Cho'gath would be.
Or Battlecast Blitzcrank.
Guardian of the Sands Azir.
Wildfire Brand.
King Jarvan IV.
Noxus Darius.
Jarvan IV is a prince. Also, King and Queen Trynd and Ashe exist because they are king and queen

Oh, you got me there with the lore, I though J4 was a king o.o.

Well, the thing is that when you look at Ashe's base model is doesn't scream QUEEN like Dianas base model screams MOON.
it screams Moon, But not Blood Moon. I want diana with red particles please.
likewise!!^^^^

> [{quoted}](name=Orangesilk,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zilaRvQR,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-08-31T00:29:23.901+0000)
>
> Nah, it's dumb because she already has the MOON concept all over her base skin, it'd make no sense for her to have a MOON skin.
> 
> Think how dumb Void Cho'gath would be.
> Or Battlecast Blitzcrank.
> Guardian of the Sands Azir.
> Wildfire Brand.
> King Jarvan IV.
> Noxus Darius.

King Tryndamere and Queen Ashe want a word with you.
if {{champion:26}} a champ that imo has no reason to have one since thresh already has one.. Has a BM skin then this is an urgent thing that she must aquire.
Just to troll us all it will be bloodmoon {{champion:89}}.

> [{quoted}](name=Hatless Casual,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zilaRvQR,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-30T19:31:24.787+0000)
>
> Just to troll us all it will be bloodmoon {{champion:89}}.

Speaking of Leona and Bloodmoon, I would think it only to be appropriate for Leona, as well as other champions, to get their own Sun version of the Bloodmoon skins.  Originally I was thinking something like Black Sun would sound and look really cool, but then I realized that may be to dark considering the Bloodmoon skins already are kind dark.  So then I thought It could be like Rising Sun Leona, or something like Shinning Sun Leona.    Unfortunately I can't think of something as catchy as 'Bloodmoon' lol.
solar eclipse {{champion:89}} ?

> [{quoted}](name=EmperorGilgamesh,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zilaRvQR,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-08-30T21:36:27.876+0000)
>
> solar eclipse {{champion:89}} ?

That involves the moon too though
Since IRL, a red moon is present in a lunar eclipse, a black sun would be a solar eclipse.
If they ever make a sun-related line of skins, it'd be dumb to include Leona in it, because she already has the sun motif.
Wait...the champion{{champion:131}}  most identified with the moon lacks a blood moon skin?!? WTF

> [{quoted}](name=Orangesilk,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zilaRvQR,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-08-31T00:32:24.800+0000)
>
> The champion most identified with the sands lacks a SHURIMA themed skin?? WTF
> 
> {{champion:268}} 
> 
> Yeah, it'd be a bland skin, like Dianas.

No, it wouldn't, because it would be a different take on the champion.  In the same way that Blackfrost Anivia still is about, well, ice, just a varied form of her champion (darker colored).  In the same way that Forecast Janna still is about the weather, just a varied form of her champion (her weather ooks more dust-like).  In the same way that Bloodlord Vladimir is still about, well, blood, just a varied form of his champion (badass different voice)

With the exception of Forecast Janna (which is an absolutely awesome alternate take on the champion) most of the skins you mentioned are what I'd consider to be rather bland, specially when held up to the standard of modern skins which completely switch the champion concept around.
well she does have a lunar goddess skin
Still not a Bloodmoon one

Honestly (apologies if this sounds rude), if they're going to make a legendary skin for her, I'd want it to be more... off the wall I suppose? I want it to truly be creative; something none of us would expect. Than it would be truly be worth my 1820/1350 RP (I don't remember which is legendary haha).

> [{quoted}](name=FIuffCow,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zilaRvQR,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-08-30T22:03:30.936+0000)
>
> Honestly (apologies if this sounds rude), if they're going to make a legendary skin for her, I'd want it to be more... off the wall I suppose? I want it to truly be creative; something none of us would expect. Than it would be truly be worth my 1820/1350 RP (I don't remember which is legendary haha).

Not rude at all lol.  You have a point, and I initially agreed with idea before posting this, but then I realized there's already some legendary skins that are just a varied forms of the classic champion, for example:

{{champion:8}} - Bloodlord {{champion:8}} 
{{champion:40}} - Forecast {{champion:40}} (she still relies on wind)
{{champion:34}} - Blackfrost {{champion:34}} (still ice/frost just a darker color

The point is, I don't think a reason such as it being too similar to her original concept would be enough reason to not give it to her.  It could really provide what I would feel would be a cool skin, and definitely on par with the standard of other legendaries.

I get what you're saying. You have a very valid point. I'm not saying I don't like this skin idea; I really do love it. I just think it would have to REALLY impress me both Visually and Voice-wise to be worth an 1820, that's all. If they could really pull off Diana as someone who thirsts for blood, give her a new voice for that skin, and make the effects blood-themed, then by all means do it. It's just that based on the image, I initially saw something that seemed like a 975 skin. Sorry, you have a great point and now that I think about it it makes quite a bit of sense. Just lots of work would have to be put into it though!

> [{quoted}](name=FIuffCow,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zilaRvQR,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-08-31T01:20:53.128+0000)
>
> I get what you're saying. You have a very valid point. I'm not saying I don't like this skin idea; I really do love it. I just think it would have to REALLY impress me both Visually and Voice-wise to be worth an 1820, that's all. If they could really pull off Diana as someone who thirsts for blood, give her a new voice for that skin, and make the effects blood-themed, then by all means do it. It's just that based on the image, I initially saw something that seemed like a 975 skin. Sorry, you have a great point and now that I think about it it makes quite a bit of sense. Just lots of work would have to be put into it though!

I hear what you're saying man. :)  It would really impress us to be worthy of being called Legendary; it wouldn't just be particle effects, she would need new animations, and maybe a new voice as well.
New animations?! Omg!! That would be so cool okay I endorse this idea now haha.

I honestly feel like Bloodmoon Diana wouldn’t be a great idea. From what we can tell there’s some sort of ritual to get Bloodmoon power ([source](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-release/elise-and-thresh-don-blood-moon-mask), Diana already worships the moon so there’s no reason for her to join the Bloodmoon.
The top one...... Is that going to be her new chroma skin kappa
the second blood moon diana picture looks so much like the bankai of one of the charecters in bleach
OMG I would buy Bloodmoon Diana in a heartbeat.

bloodmoon skins come from stories are ionans tell about the shadow isles because they never actually saw them and they can just imagine how they could be like. I don't think it would be right to just give diana a bloodmoon skin, even if it looks cool.
inb4 {{champion:89}} Leona steals this for her like... 10th skin and Diana still sits w/ 3 (base/classic skin included).
I am 80% sure they will make a bloodmoon skin for diana,  legendary uuuh I doubt it, but why not ? :D
"Gutted Diana". That would be a good skin.
